report.name: refpca43

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select:
select DECODE(LENGTH(RTRIM(LPAD(:P_PARAM6, 7, '0'),'*')), 7,'DEPARTEMENT/POLE/GROUPE : ', 5,'DEPARTEMENT/POLE : ', 'DEPARTEMENT : ') || LPAD(:P_PARAM6, 7, '0') titre, cm.clisigle DirMO, substr(LPAD(lb.codsg, 7, '0'), 1, 5) CODEDP, lb.typproj PTYPE, lb.dpcode REF, rtrim( dp.dplib , ' ') REFLIB, -- 35 c lb.clicode PCMOUVRA, lb.pid PID, lb.arctype TYPE2, ta.libarc LIBTYPE2, lb.codcamo CODCAMO, substr(lb.pnom,1,25) LIBPROJET, --25 c lb.codsg CODEDPG, substr(r.rnom,1,12) CHEFPROJET, -- 8 c nvl(conso.cusag,0) CONSOJH, floor(nvl(budg.reestime,0)) REESTJH, nvl(budg.bpmontme,0) PROPOJH, nvl(budg.bpmontmo,0) PROPOMOJH, nvl(budg.bnmont,0) NOTIFJH, nvl(budg.anmont,0) ARBITJH, nvl(budg1.bpmontme,0) PROPOJH1, nvl(budg1.bpmontmo,0) PROPOMOJH1 from ligne_bip lb , dossier_projet dp, budget budg , budget budg1, consomme conso, ressource r, client_mo cm, type_activite ta where lb.dpcode = dp.dpcode and lb.typproj='1 ' and lb.pcpi = r.ident and lb.clicode = cm.clicode and ta.arctype=lb.arctype and lb.pid = budg.pid (+) and lb.pid = conso.pid (+) and lb.pid = budg1.pid (+) and ( (conso.cusag <> 0 AND conso.cusag is not null ) OR (budg.reestime <> 0 AND budg.reestime is not null ) OR (budg.bpmontme <> 0 AND budg.bpmontme is not null ) OR (budg.bpmontmo <> 0 AND budg.bpmontmo is not null ) OR (budg.bnmont <> 0 AND budg.bnmont is not null ) OR (budg.anmont <> 0 AND budg.anmont is not null ) OR (budg1.bpmontme <> 0 AND budg1.bpmontme is not null ) OR (budg1.bpmontmo <> 0 AND budg1.bpmontmo is not null ) ) &P_WHERE
-- and pb.bpannee (+) = &an0 -- and bn.bnannee (+) = &an0 -- and bn.bnannee (+) = &an0 -- and ban.anannee (+) = &an0 -- and pb1.bpannee (+) = &an1 -- and lb.codsg like '1614%' Order by CODEDPG desc

dataDescriptor.expression: DECODE ( LENGTH ( RTRIM ( LPAD ( : P_PARAM6 , 7 , '0' ) , '*' ) ) , 7 , 'DEPARTEMENT/POLE/GROUPE : ' , 5 , 'DEPARTEMENT/POLE : ' , 'DEPARTEMENT : ' ) || LPAD ( : P_PARAM6 , 7 , '0' )

textSegment.string: PROJETS DE DEVELOPPEMENT - grand T1 et P1

function.name: afterpform
rtrimetoile
cf_lastmonthdate
cf_an1
cf_an0
b_total_reflib2formattrigger
f_reflib1formattrigger
f_codedpformattrigger
m_2_ftrformattrigger
